children.markdown:
[![image](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2010/07/image_thumb2.png?resize=212%2C123 "image")](https://i2.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2010/07/image_22.png) [Michael Targett](http://twitter.com/mtargettuk "Michael Targett") and his team (pictured right) are doing some awesome work from the Farnborough Air Show this week – their rolling coverage is [all aggregated on the main site](http://www.flightglobal.com/air-shows/farnborough/).
Well worth a look, even if you don’t give a hoot about aviation, to see what a skilled and enthusiastic team can do with a major event.
As a taster, here’s [Flightblogger](http://www.flightglobal.com/blogs/runway-girl/) and [Runway Girl](http://www.flightglobal.com/blogs/runway-girl/) summing up the first day of the show:
[![Enhanced by Zemanta](https://i1.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2010/07/zemified_a3.png?w=960)](http://www.zemanta.com/ "Enhanced by Zemanta")
